itemdesc-temporalgift-c: Looks like it has some goodies, but will probably dissapear once opened.
game:traitdesc-len-fortunate: Always seems to get a bit more,no matter the task
game:traitdesc-len-burdened: Always carrying some probably-useless object slows you down.
game:traitdesc-len-farmer: You have a green thumb, and get more produce from farmed crops.
game:traitdesc-len-cook: Start with a carefully packed case of items useful for a small kitchen.
game:charattribute-wholeVesselLootChance: +10% chance for max loot drops from vessels
game:characterdesc-len-hoarder:
Oh,shiny! Mine!

Hoarders can't seem to let go of even the simplest of objects, even if it is worthless to others.To be fair, they find a lot. They start with a sturdy backpack, and can make them easier.
game:characterdesc-len-culinary-farmer:
No you can't know the secret ingredient, then it wouldn't be a secret!

Culinary Experts work mostly as cooks and farmhands;despite working with their hands often, they are rather frail. They get more drops from farmed crops.
